channel.title: CVE Feed for ASUS Japan Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ASUS Japan Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-0647|2024-08-05T03:35:48.902Z -- asus%20japan%20inc. -- wl-330nul
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WL-330NUL Firmware version prior to 3.0.0.46 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0581|2024-08-05T03:28:11.190Z -- asus%20japan%20inc. -- rt-ac87u
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ASUS RT-AC87U Firmware version prior to 3.0.0.4.378.9383 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0582|2024-08-05T03:28:11.172Z -- asus%20japan%20inc. -- rt-ac68u
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ASUS RT-AC68U Firmware version prior to 3.0.0.4.380.1031 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0583|2024-08-05T03:28:11.233Z -- asus%20japan%20inc. -- rt-ac1200hp
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ASUS RT-AC1200HP Firmware version prior to 3.0.0.4.380.4180 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
